title: Zyra's Plants
body: Hi. i m a Fan and Main of Zyra, but lately her plants stop attaking minions or champons when summond or after they are summond and the champs and minions are face to face to the plant as well they dont suddenly prioritize champs please help

replies.body:
That was changed almost a year ago..

They attack the nearest target and switch targets if it becomes untargetable, or when you attack anything within range. Auto-focusing champions was unintended and overpowered.

yea i understand that but, when i m face to face and i summon a plant it dont attack at all even tho i m in the mids of battle for example i have seeds around me and lee hits me with his q and then comes to me as he does i summon my plants, with in seconds tthey suppos to hit lee since he is right infront of me and them but they dont takes 4 to 5 seconds to actualy target him, that is what i ask why they do that and in other times they attack as soon as they apeareven if the  target is not right infront as long as they are in range so why they dont attack when they are a lot closer? it does not happen all the time but you know how it is when you need them the most they dont  attack even when you ult and they are with in range of your plants.
